title: Organization / NGO
description: Represents a non-governmental organization, non-profit, or similar entity.

organizationId.description: A unique identifier for the organization.

organizationName.description: The full name of the organization.

acronym.description: The common acronym for the organization (e.g., 'UN', 'NRA').

missionStatement.description: The official mission statement of the organization.

legalStatus.description: The legal status of the organization (e.g., 'Non-profit', '501(c)(3)').

foundingDate.description: The date the organization was founded.

keyPersonnel.description: A list of key personnel or leadership, such as the CEO or Executive Director.

personId.description: The unique identifier of the person.

role.description: The person's role in the organization (e.g., 'Executive Director', 'Board Member').

phoneNumbers.description: A list of contact numbers for the organization.

emailAddresses.description: A list of official email addresses for the organization.

type.description: The type of email address (e.g., 'general inquiries', 'media').

addresses.description: A list of physical addresses for the organization's offices.
